attributes.action: disbandon political correctness and equality laws created by harriet harman
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These crazy laws only hurt businesses, Why should some one discriminate against a white male even if their better for the job just because they need to make a quoter. Positive discrimination is still discrimination and the best man for the job should get that job!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
